comment: Mutlu starts off strict, but he's the most helpful professor I've had at KSU. If you follow the syllabus and turn in your assignments on time, you'll be fine. He does curve at the end, so don't give up if things seem tough early on. Take his class if you want to learn something—it's worth it.
Would definitely recommend if you're looking for a solid ACCT class.
Take his class if you really want to learn something. It's a difficult class but he makes it easy to understand. Grading is generous too.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: absolutely terrible
Didn't like this teacher or his class! Does not explain the content well and even makes students teach the class. Not worth taking if your objective is to learn something.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Group projects--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Please avoid taking this professor if you can. You will spend so many hours on this class alone. You have 3 homework assignments every chapter that take hours and you only get 6-8 points per homework, where as the tests at 100 points. Quizzes are 50 points, but they are open notes, not that that helped much. The material wasn't like the homework.

This class is very difficult and you will struggle to complete most assignments. I am not even 6 weeks into class with multiple assignments that take 5-10 hours a piece. Please steer clear of this teacher if you have the option it will take you more time to receive a grade of 10% then it is worth.

He is a decent choice for accounting I, but he is so tough to reach outside class. He hasn't answered my emails in a timely manner ever, and even though he is a good teacher, it is very hard to grasp knowledge with just class lectures. The SI will be your best friend in this very difficult class.

Take this Professor! Accounting is hard regardless but this teacher makes it understandable. 3 exams and homework every week. First exam is in class, the rest are online and you can use your notes. There's one excel project but he gives you a video that explains exactly how to do it. Attendance is not mandatory but helps if you go. Take him!
Hes an amazing teacher.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Amazing lectures

comment: Financial accouting is a difficult class at first but he does what he can to help you succeed. Two Mid-Terms , and a Final with a lot of homework.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT--Tests are tough

comment: Great professor. He tries very hard so that students can understand the materials. Definitely recommended if your major is accounting
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational

comment: I lost my 4.0 because of this class. I had an 89 going into the final and ended up with a B. He gives a project over spring break unannounced, which made me drop from an A to a B. Take Marty Varon for Accounting, I promise you will make an A by doing the bare minimum.

Professor Mutlu did an amazing job teaching such a tough course. He really wants his students to succeed, so he gives out alot of handouts and goes over everything thoroughly to make sure everyone understands. He uses Accounting Connect with assignments/quizzes due every week and gives 3 test. Take advantage of office hours!

Professor Mutlu did an amazing job making an extremely difficult class bearable. Tests are very difficult but your grade will reflect the effort you put in, so you must study and definitely attend class. 3 tests and online assignments about once a week. Textbook not needed

Professor Mutlu did a great job of being clear with his expectations and the course material. Definitely take this class if you are looking for a dependable professor. The first day I thought I would hate his class, but you will start to understand his personality more as the semester progresses.

Accounting Information Systems. Tests were difficult. But the professor gave slides and sample questions that helped immensely. No homework. A few assignments. Group project that is time consuming. Overall a pretty easy class. Professor is knowledgeable but sometimes cannot get his point across, but willing to help
This is a tough class but Prof. Mutlu is very helpful.  He is always available during office hours and will take time to work with students if they ask him for help.

I took this class not knowing what to expect. The tests are hard and you do have to work for it, but Professor Mutlu makes that clear from the beginning. The good part though is that he is very open to helping you and questions. Also, he curves quite frequently and the online homework and quiz grades are a real homework booster.
Prof. Mutlu is great! Easy to understand, tests always curve up. He knows how to make the class more interesting and quickly replys to your email. I would definitely take him again.

This is a rigorous class, which is something you can't get away from when taking accounting, but Prof. Mutlu was a really good professor. He's there to help you succeed. I would take him again and have recommended him to my friends.

One of the best professors I've ever had! This has been a challenging class for me, but I love it because of the professor. He will always respond to your emails and questions, and he takes students' feedback seriously. Even if accounting is not your strongest subject, I would highly recommend taking his class. He is an awesome teacher.
Difficult class, but the professor makes the class time enjoyable. He cares about students, remembers their names.
